DOC.brief_summary: An observational study determine impact multiple neutralizing antibody ( NAb ) test treatment pattern compare usual care MS patient receive high-dose IFN therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Determine Impact Multiple NAb Tests Treatment Compared Usual Care MS Patients High-dose IFN Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: An observational study determine impact multiple neutralizing antibody ( NAb ) test treatment pattern compare usual care MS patient receive high-dose IFN therapy .
DOC.criteria: Willing provide inform consent . Male female , 18 year age old , diagnosis MS. Has oral parenteral corticosteroid therapy within two week prior Baseline Visit . Has treat immunoglobulin ( IgG ) plasmapheresis within last six month . Has condition investigator nurse feel may interfere participation study assessment full duration study . Previously participate study . Has receive experimental drug last thirty ( 30 ) day .
